text: Had several issues with the MSI GF63 9SC-060CA Thin 15.6" IPS Intel Core i5 9th Gen 9300H (2.40 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 8 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop since day one. performance throttles under load and the screen brightness feels cheap. Performance in competitive gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

An average performer. The NVIDIA GTX 1650 is good, but I expected a bit more from the keyboard on the MSI GF63 9SC-060CA Thin 15.6" IPS Intel Core i5 9th Gen 9300H (2.40 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 8 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.

Quite disappointed with this laptop, the MSI GF63 9SC-060CA Thin 15.6" IPS Intel Core i5 9th Gen 9300H (2.40 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 8 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop. It Wi-Fi drops intermittently frequently when playing Cyberpunk 2077, and the performance throttles significantly. The speakers has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Valorant and Call of Duty: Warzone. The build quality of the MSI GF63 9SC-060CA Thin 15.6" IPS Intel Core i5 9th Gen 9300H (2.40 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 8 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the battery life is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Starfield, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the MSI GF63 9SC-060CA Thin 15.6" IPS Intel Core i5 9th Gen 9300H (2.40 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 8 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop. The port selection is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.
